meanings.definition: ムシクイ科（旧世界ムシクイ科に分類される場合もある）
meanings.english_definition: The New World warblers, a family of small, often colorful, passerine birds. (Sometimes classified under Parulidae).

etymology.value: From the genus name *Mniotilta* (black-and-white warbler) +‎ *-idae* (taxonomic suffix for families).
